list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a solemn utterance intended to invoke a supernatural power to inflict harm or punishment on someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she'd put a curse on him
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: cô ấy đặt một lời nguyền lên anh ta

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an offensive word or phrase used to express anger or annoyance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his mouth was spitting vile oaths and curses
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Miệng anh khẳng định lời thề và nguyền rủa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: invoke or use a curse against.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it often seemed as if the family had been cursed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dường như họ thường bị nguyền rủa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: utter offensive words in anger or annoyance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: drivers were cursing and sounding their horns
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người lái xe đang chửi rủa và âm thanh sừng của họ
